original_text: Moved by the Spirit, he went into the temple courts. When the parents brought in the child Jesus to do for him what the custom of the Law required,
korean_text: 성령의 감동으로 성전에 들어가매 마침 부모가 율법의 관례대로 행하고자 하여 그 아기 예수를 데리고 오는지라

sentences.original_text: he went into the temple courts.
When the parents brought in the child Jesus
to do for him what the custom of the Law required,
sentences.korean_translation: 율법의 관례에 따라 그를 위해 행할 일을 하려고
